segments.text: Honestly, what a mess this kitchen is becoming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just streaming everywhere, ruining the cabinets, I'm sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, she's just calmly polishing a plate, absolutely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating to see such blatant inattention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those children are clearly up to no good, climbing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Can't they wait to ask for a treat?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balance on that stool is terrible; he's going to end up hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there will be water everywhere and a crying child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer lack of foresight here is just beyond me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who leaves a faucet running unattended like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is just sloppy and irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the contrast with the perfectly tidy garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a genuine mess, and it makes me quite annoyed.
segments.speaker: PAR
